nodes.bodyText: Is this also specific only to snapshots? Do we ever use GA releases? And in that case, I assume we'd get those just from jcenter or maven central. If so, should we use a version regex filter here as well?
FYI, since this is Groovy we can use regex literal notation to avoid all the nasty string escaping so this could be /org\.apache\.lucene/ instead avoiding the redundant escape character.
